snippet: At least four people were killed and 17 others injured in Midland, Tex., when a freight train crashed into a parade float, the authorities said.
abstract: At least four people are killed and 17 others injured in Midland, Tex, when freight train crashes into parade float at event honoring veterans.
lead_paragraph: At least four people were killed and 17 others injured in Midland, Tex., when a freight train crashed into a parade float, the authorities said.

headline.seo: Train Crash Kills 4 at Veterans Parade in Texas
headline.main: Deadly Train Crash at Parade for Veterans
headline.print_headline: Deadly Train Crash at Parade for Veterans
